nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace The Official Souvenir Magazine

Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace The Official Souvenir Magazine is a one-shot magazine issue that features content from the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The issue was edited by Bob Woods, with writing contributions by Marc Patten and Mark Cotta Vaz, and it was first published by Topps on May 19, 1999, in conjunction with the film.
